subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Yogi Berra was asked during a news conference if he would really miss George Steinbrenner, he said warmly, a pristine Yankees cap perched on his head: “Darn right, I will. He was a good man.”
snippet: When Yogi Berra was asked during a news conference if he would really miss George Steinbrenner, he said warmly, a pristine Yankees cap perched on his head: “Darn right, I will. He was a good man.”
